participant_1.background:
I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i work for a magazine.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I love sharing stories of my adventures with my family and friends over a home-cooked meal.

participant_2.background:
My dad and brother are my two main sources of support.
i always put my left sock on first.
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
my favorite music is rock and roll.
i write children s books.

content.text: Hi, my name is Ben and I work for a magazine.
Hello Ben, my name is Sara and I write children's books.
That's so cool! What is your favorite part about writing children's books?
I love seeing my imagination come to life on the page and I love knowing that I am making a difference in the lives of children.
That's amazing! I am always impressed by people who can bring their creativity to life.
Thanks! I am always looking for new ways to challenge myself and grow as a writer.
That's great! What are some of your goals for the future?
I want to learn how to use technology in the classroom to engage my students and help them learn better.
That's a great goal! I am sure you will be able to achieve it.
Thanks! I am excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I am sure you will do great things.
Thanks Ben! It was nice talking to you.
You too Sara! Have a great day!
